verses.name: Acts 19:21
verses.text: After these things were ended, Paul purposed in the spirit, when he had passed through Macedonia and Achaia, to go to Jerusalem, saying, After I have been there, I must also see Rome.

verses.name: Acts 19:22
verses.text: So he sent into Macedonia two of them that ministered unto him, Timotheus and Erastus; but he himself stayed in Asia for a season.

verses.name: Acts 19:23
verses.text: And the same time there arose no small stir about that way.

verses.name: Acts 19:24
verses.text: For a certain man named Demetrius, a silversmith, which made silver shrines for Diana, brought no small gain unto the craftsmen;
